review: A stylish electric urban commuter that feels and looks beautifully built
Overall it's okay, but buying a good one is a mine field due to owners. I'd not recommended one as they cost in maintenance unless you know how to use tools.
The Horwin CR6 mixes retro styling with electric power and can get you across town for just a penny a mile
It's more than just a motorway cruiser, it's an unlikely performance bike, too
As a road bike, it's very hard to fault and I never stopped smiling on the XSR.
Everything that's good about a standard Ténéré plus a bit more
